Queue with messages that need to be published to RabbitMQ

member.name: T:vgt_saga_flight.StatsService.StatsQueueHandler
member.summary:
Class handling RabbitMQ connections, messages and events; all concerning SAGA transactions with an orchestrator. Configuration data needed for this class is as follows.
Rabbit connection:
RABBIT_HOST - Address of the rabbit server.
RABBIT_VIRT_HOST - Virtual host of the rabbit server.
RABBIT_PORT - Port of the rabbit server.
RABBIT_USR - Username to login with.
RABBIT_PASSWORD - User password to login with.
and
Queue names:
RABBIT_REPLIES - Queue of the replies sent back to the orchestrator.
RABBIT_ORDER - Queue of the requests sent by the orchestrator to the order service.

member.exception: Which variable is missing in the configuration

member.returns: null if invalid otherwise deserialized Saga Message
